content.text: Match ends, Liverpool 3, Manchester City 0.
Second Half ends, Liverpool 3, Manchester City 0.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Raheem Sterling (Manchester City).
Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jordan Henderson (Liverpool).
Substitution, Liverpool. Alberto Moreno replaces Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain.
Offside, Manchester City. David Silva tries a through ball, but Leroy Sané is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Fernandinho (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by David Silva.
Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City).
Sadio Mané (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City).
James Milner (Liverpool) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Raheem Sterling with a cross.
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool).
Foul by David Silva (Manchester City).
Dejan Lovren (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Sadio Mané (Liverpool) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dominic Solanke.
Substitution, Liverpool. Dominic Solanke replaces Roberto Firmino.
Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Leroy Sané (Manchester City).
Attempt missed. Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by David Silva with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Dejan Lovren.
Offside, Manchester City. Kevin De Bruyne tries a through ball, but David Silva is caught offside.

Substitution, Manchester City. Raheem Sterling replaces Ilkay Gündogan.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Jordan Henderson.

Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Trent Alexander-Arnold.
Substitution, Liverpool. Georginio Wijnaldum replaces Mohamed Salah because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left misses to the right. Assisted by Fernandinho.
Attempt missed. Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) with an attempt from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by David Silva with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Trent Alexander-Arnold.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain.
Second Half begins Liverpool 3, Manchester City 0.
First Half ends, Liverpool 3, Manchester City 0.
